code: import _toConsumableArray from"/home/dipti/Codes/Dursikshya 1-2/REACT/Ecommerce_React_main/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray.js";import _objectSpread from"/home/dipti/Codes/Dursikshya 1-2/REACT/Ecommerce_React_main/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import Swal from"sweetalert2";import{ADD_TO_CART,EMPTY_CART,REMOVE_FROM_CART,UPDATE_CART}from"./cartConstants";var initial_data={cart_items:[]};export var cartReducer=function cartReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initial_data;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ADD_TO_CART:var item=action.payload;var itemExists=state.cart_items.find(function(cart_item){return cart_item._id===item._id;});if(itemExists){Swal.fire({"title":"Warning","text":"Item already in cart","icon":"Warning","timer":3000});return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{cart_items:_toConsumableArray(state.cart_items)});}else{Swal.fire({"title":"Success","text":"Item added in cart","icon":"Success","timer":3000});return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{cart_items:[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state.cart_items),[item])});}break;case REMOVE_FROM_CART:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{cart_items:_toConsumableArray(state.cart_items.filter(function(item){return item._id!==action.payload;}))});break;case EMPTY_CART:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{cart_items:[]});case UPDATE_CART:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{cart_items:_toConsumableArray(state.cart_items.map(function(item){return item._id===action.payload._id?action.payload:item;}))});default:return state;}};
